New Records: USA scored 197 runs, the highest score in the match
Aaron Jones scored 128 runs, a significant individual achievement
Key Match Events: Scorecard showed runs per over for each team
Pre-Game Insights: USA won the toss and elected to bowl
Umpires and referee for the match were named
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match was held at Grand Prairie Stadium
The match was the World Cup opener
